tool_description: The ForecastMaster API is your gateway to reliable and up-to-date weather information. Access current weather data, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and more, for any city worldwide. With seamless integration and user-friendly endpoints, ForecastMaster simplifies weather data retrieval for applications across various industries. Whether you're developing travel apps, event planners, or IoT solutions, our API offers accurate forecasts to enhance user experiences. Join now to harnes...
name: ForecastMaster API - Real-time Weather Data Provider
title: ForecastMaster API - Real-time Weather Data Provider

api_list.description: The endpoint api.openweathermap.org is the base URL for the OpenWeatherMap API, a service that provides weather data and forecasts. This endpoint serves as the gateway to access various weather-related functionalities and information provided by OpenWeatherMap.
